itunes:title: Doctrine and Covenants 14-17 : Dr. Casey Griffiths : Part I
title: Doctrine and Covenants 14-17 : Dr. Casey Griffiths : Part I
description: We meet the Whitmers and follow the early Restoration Heroes as they travel and work between the Trifecta of Translation: Harmony, PA, Colesville, NY, and Palmyra, NY. Dr. Casey Griffiths explains the Whitmer family's closeness, shares a story of miraculous farming, and relates the early Saints' character.
content:encoded: We meet the Whitmers and follow the early Restoration Heroes as they travel and work between the Trifecta of Translation: Harmony, PA, Colesville, NY, and Palmyra, NY. Dr. Casey Griffiths explains the Whitmer family's closeness, shares a story of miraculous farming, and relates the early Saints' character.
itunes:author: Hank Smith & John Bytheway
